column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////They offer different broths
column4: and vege. They also have pretty good appetizers and sukiyaki bowl options if you are not a huge fan of ramen. They have pretty good tonkatsu ramen if you are first time visitor at this restaurant. Brussel sprouts tempura
column5: and takoyaki are their best selling appetizer items. Id give 4/5 for both. Last time I visited
column7: and it was really salty. Didn't bring it up thinking it is how its been made
column8: but i saw alot of people complaining about this as well.
